content: description the check you later throw is the perfect crochet pattern for those looking to create a cozy and on-trend blanket this throw features a modern checkered design using 2 different stitches and 2 different yarns for a beautiful texture the pattern is beginner friendly and includes a video tutorial along with the detailed written instructions the check you later throw pattern is free on my blog 1 the check you later throw is available as a lion brand kit 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your throw plus a free copy of the printable pdf pattern you can even customize your yarn colors i have a full video tutorial available for the check you later throw 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/check-you-later-throw-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/41jxs 3 https //youtu be/vt-olmwcgia
